trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Clear-Variable
trans-unit.target: Clear-Variable

trans-unit.source: Clear-Variable
trans-unit.target: Clear-Variable

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Deletes the value of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 删除变量的值。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Clear-Variable** cmdlet deletes the data stored in a variable, but it does not delete the variable.
trans-unit.target: **Clear-variable** cmdlet 删除数据存储在变量中，但不会删除该变量。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the variable is NULL (empty).
trans-unit.target: 因此，该变量的值为 NULL（空）。

trans-unit.source: If the variable has a specified data or object type, this cmdlet preserves the type of the object stored in the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果该变量指定的数据或对象类型，此 cmdlet 将保留存储在变量中的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Remove the value of global variables that begin with a search string
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 删除搜索字符串开头的全局变量的值

trans-unit.source: This command removes the value of global variables that have names that begin with my.
trans-unit.target: 此命令删除具有以开头的名称的全局变量的值我。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Clear a variable in a child scope but not the parent scope
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 清除子作用域，但不是父作用域中的变量

trans-unit.source: These commands demonstrate that clearing a variable in a child scope does not clear the value in the parent scope.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令演示了清除子作用域中的变量并不会清除父作用域中的值。

trans-unit.source: The first command sets the value of the variable $A to 3.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令将变量 $A 的值设置为 3。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the invoke operator (&) to run the **Clear-Variable** command in a new scope.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用调用运算符 (&) 来运行 **Clear-variable** 命令在新的作用域中。

trans-unit.source: The variable is cleared in the child scope (although it did not exist), but it is not cleared in the local scope.
trans-unit.target: 在子作用域中清除该变量（尽管它不存在），但不会在本地作用域中清除它。

trans-unit.source: The third command, which gets the value of $A, shows that the value 3 is unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 获取 $A 的值，第三个命令显示值 3 不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Delete the value of the specified variable
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 删除指定的变量的值

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the value of the variable named Processes.
trans-unit.target: 此命令删除名为进程的变量的值。

trans-unit.source: After the cmdlet completes the operation, the variable named Processes still exists, but the value is null.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 成功完成操作后，名为进程的变量仍存在，但值为 null。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of items that this cmdlet omits in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在操作中指定此 cmdlet 省略的项的数组。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *名称* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as s*.
trans-unit.target: 输入名称元素或模式，例如 s *。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the cmdlet clears a variable even if it is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 指示该 cmdlet 清除变量，即使它是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Even using the *Force* parameter, the cmdlet cannot clear constants.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 *强制* 参数，该 cmdlet 不能清除常量。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of items that this cmdlet includes in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 将在操作中包括的项的数组。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *名称* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as s*.
trans-unit.target: 输入名称元素或模式，例如 s *。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the variable to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 指定要清除的变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required, but the parameter name, Name, is optional.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的但是参数名称，名称是可选的。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the item with which you are working.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表你所处理的项目的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -Scope
trans-unit.target: 作用域

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scope in which this alias is valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定此别名的有效作用域。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此参数的可接受的值是：

trans-unit.source: Global
trans-unit.target: 全局

trans-unit.source: Local
trans-unit.target: 本地

trans-unit.source: Script
trans-unit.target: 脚本

trans-unit.source: You can also use a number relative to the current scope (0 through the number of scopes, where 0 is the current scope and 1 is its parent).
trans-unit.target: 相对于当前作用域 (0 到作用域，其中 0 是当前作用域，1 是其父级的数)，您还可以使用一个数字。

trans-unit.source: Local is the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为本地。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Scopes.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Scopes。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将对象传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None or System.Management.Automation.PSVariable
trans-unit.target: 无或 System.Management.Automation.PSVariable

trans-unit.source: When you use the *PassThru* parameter, this cmdlet generates a **System.Management.Automation.PSVariable** object representing the cleared variable.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 *PassThru* 参数，此 cmdlet 生成 **System.Management.Automation.PSVariable** 对象，表示已清除的变量。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: To delete a variable, along with its value, use the Remove-Variable or Remove-Item cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除变量及其值，请使用删除 Remove-variable 或 Remove-item cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not delete the values of variables that are set as constants or owned by the system, even if you use the *Force* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不会删除设置为常量或由系统所拥有的变量的值，即使您使用 *强制* 参数。

trans-unit.source: If the variable that you are clearing does not exist, the cmdlet has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果你清除的变量不存在，则此 cmdlet 无效。

trans-unit.source: It does not create a variable with a null value.
trans-unit.target: 它不会创建具有 null 值的变量。

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Clear-Variable** by its built-in alias, clv.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以指 **Clear-variable** 内置来对其别名，clv。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Get-Variable

trans-unit.target: New-Variable

trans-unit.target: Remove-Variable

trans-unit.target: Set-Variable
